implementation.functions: -- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- SiteSensor -- https://github.com/toggledbits/SiteSensor -- Patrick Rigney, patrick@toggledbits.com -- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- function startupSiteSensor(dev) luup.log("SiteSensor STARTUP!") SiteSensor = require("L_SiteSensor1") runQuery = SiteSensor.runQuery SiteSensor.init(dev) end

action.name: GetStatus
action.run: return -- what we do here doesn't matter, luup uses the relatedStateVariable directly

action.name: GetInterval
action.run: return -- what we do here doesn't matter, luup uses the relatedStateVariable directly

action.name: SetInterval
action.run: local newInterval = lul_settings.newTargetValue if newInterval ~= nil then newInterval = tonumber(newInterval, 10) end luup.variable_set("urn:toggledbits-com:serviceId:SiteSensor1", "Interval", newInterval, lul_device)

action.name: GetRequestURL
action.run: return -- what we do here doesn't matter, luup uses the relatedStateVariable directly

action.name: SetRequestURL
action.run: local newRequestURL = lul_settings.newTargetValue or "" luup.variable_set("urn:toggledbits-com:serviceId:SiteSensor1", "RequestURL", newRequestURL, lul_device)

action.name: SetArmed
action.run: local armed = lul_settings.newArmedValue or "0" if armed == "1" then SiteSensor.arm(lul_device) else SiteSensor.disarm(lul_device) end return true

action.name: GetArmed
action.run: return -- what we do here doesn't matter, luup uses the relatedStateVariable directly
